content.p: Associate Professor, Module Convener / Teaching: Communications & Networks Teaching: Academic & Professional Skills for Foundation Fundamentals of Computing Management Information System (E-Commerce, Knowledge Management, Educational Technology) Decision Support System (knowledge Management) Information Retrieval(data Mining) E-Commerce (web commerce, e-commerce and social commerce on security, privacy and trust) Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia University of Nottingham Malaysia DULN001(B) telephone: +6 03 8924 8000 fax: +6 03 8924 8005 course enquiries: +6 03 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays)
